@Jazelmoran83 As I with you! Maybe we both have the wrong answer but I feel that society must continue this dialogue to find a solution.
@Jazelmoran83 I may be wrong but I think the victims would rather have their lives/loved ones instead of that 'freedom'...
@Jazelmoran83 Also where in the article does it state the weapon used was fully automatic? Or is that waiting on the official report?
@Jazelmoran83 He brought 23 guns but only used one? Why does anyone need 23 guns to begin with?
@Jazelmoran83 I haven't proposed any laws. I'm just saying that stronger restrictions/vetting wouldn't hurt!
@Jazelmoran83 I think it'd be better for everyone to wait for the official report :)
@Jazelmoran83 I don't have any need for murder weapons. Do you have a link to your source of the images?
@Jazelmoran83 I may be wrong, please link me the police report if I am!

@Jazelmoran83 I'm not saying to strip the second amendment. I'm simply curious as to why semi automatic weapons are necessary
